Description.Text:
Heliotrope Hotels is a 4**** Hotel Complex of 62 hotel rooms 2 restaurants, 4 bars, 1 pool bar, pool, free parking, meeting rooms with multimedia facilities, wifi internet, banquet facilities and an extra kitchen for gastronomic presentations.American and Lesvian Breakfast is served.
All rooms are equipped with TV, air conditioning, central heating, safe-box, mini bar, hair dryer, free wifi internet, sea view balcony (many of them both with sea view and pool view balcony).
Situated in Mytilene at Varia suburb, 2km from the commercial centre to the airport (on the coastal road with the mansions) providing exceptional facilities for business and leisure travellers.
